Title: Universal Soldier
Writer: Richard Rothstein, Christopher Leitch, Dean Devlin
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren, Ally Walker, Ed O'Ross
Plot: Two rival soldiers who were killed in Vietnam are brought back to life in a top secret military experiment that creates superhuman warriors.
Production: Centropolis Film Productions, IndieProd, Carolco Pictures Inc.
